metadata.title: CVE-2024-57921 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Add a lock when accessing the buddy trim functionWhen running YouTube videos and Steam games simultaneously,the tester found a system hang / race condition issue withthe multi-display configuration setting.
